name: Re-order audio streams by language
author: Josh.5
description:
Specify a language tag for Unmanic to try and put as 1st audio track.

In the plugin settings, specify a 'Search String'. The plugin will search the files to find matching audio tracks. The matching audio tracks will be moved to the 1st audio track.

Examples of search strings:
  - 'en'
  - 'fr'
  - 'de'
